headline: C.H. Robinson Worldwide (CHRW) Valuation Check After Strong Recent Share Price Momentum
summary: Why C.H. Robinson Worldwide is on investors’ radar C.H. Robinson Worldwide (CHRW) has drawn attention after recent share price moves, with the stock now around $179.38 and short term returns across the past week, month, and past 3 months all in positive territory. For investors watching transportation and logistics names, these price shifts, paired with reported annual revenue of about US$16.5b and net income of roughly US$600 million, raise questions about how the business is currently being...
